vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Moabites living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.4; married to Chilion (H3630)
§ Orpah = "gazelle"
a Moabite woman, wife of Chilion, the son of Naomi, and sister-in- law of Ruth
vocabInfos._es_Definition: de Moab; esposa de Quilión, hijo de Elimélec
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
俄耳巴 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "瞪羚"
摩押女子,拿俄米之子基連的妻子,也是路得的妯娌
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
俄耳巴 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "瞪羚"
摩押女子,拿俄米之子基连的妻子,也是路得的妯娌
